label: 14–18 years
notes: Adolescent; higher calcium (1300mg) and phosphorus (1250mg) needs for bone development

label: 19–30 years
notes: Young adult; peak bone mass achieved in this period

label: 31–50 years
notes: Adult; most common pregnancy age range

label: 51+ years
notes: Postmenopausal; some nutrient needs change (higher calcium, lower iron after menopause)
